titles.title: HP615 Let us break bread together with the Lord

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Let us break bread together with the Lord;
Let us break bread together with the Lord:

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Let us drink wine together with the Lord;
Let us drink wine together with the Lord

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Let us praise God together in the Lord;
Let us praise God together in the Lord:

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
When I fall on my knees
With my face to the rising sun
O Lord, have mercy on me.
